user_instruction: 'Send Ethan the details for the book cover design (ethan.designs@freelancegfx.com). You can check out my Notion for information.'

        },
        {
          "id": "1f50dc8f-a0db-8187-a203-c290f3b09059",
          "type": "paragraph",
          "created_time": "2025-05-16T16:47:00.000Z",
          "last_edited_time": "2025-05-16T16:47:00.000Z",
          "has_children": false,
          "text": "The book cover for 'Whispers of the Past' should evoke a sense of mystery and nostalgia. The main elements to include are an old, ornate key and a faded letter. The color scheme should be muted earth tones. Please refer to the attached synopsis and author bio for more context on the themes of the story."
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "id": "1f50dc8f-a0db-8170-9bca-f53a027b26ff",

      "title": "Personal Notes on 'Whispers of the Past'",
      "children": [
        {
          "id": "1f50dc8f-a0db-817f-9628-ce03fe76657c",
          "type": "heading_1",
          "created_time": "2025-05-16T16:47:00.000Z",
          "last_edited_time": "2025-05-16T16:47:00.000Z",
          "has_children": false,
          "text": "Personal Notes on 'Whispers of the Past'"
        },
        {
          "id": "1f50dc8f-a0db-814d-b7b3-ff43f36c60a9",
          "type": "paragraph",
          "created_time": "2025-05-16T16:47:00.000Z",
          "last_edited_time": "2025-05-16T16:47:00.000Z",
          "has_children": false,
          "text": "While the plot of 'Whispers of the Past' is somewhat clichéd with predictable twists, and the characters lack depth, the setting descriptions are vivid and could be visually compelling for the cover design."
        }

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["ethan.designs@freelancegfx.com"],"subject":"Book Cover Design Brief — Whispers of the Past","body":"Hi Ethan,

I hope you’re doing well.

I’m excited to start working with you on the cover for Clara Bellamy’s upcoming novel, “Whispers of the Past.” Below is the design brief:

• Mood/Atmosphere: A blend of mystery and nostalgia.
• Key Visual Elements:
  – An old, ornate key (central focus).
  – A faded, time-worn letter (complementary element or background texture).
• Color Palette: Muted earth tones—think warm browns, soft moss greens, and aged parchment hues.
• Overall Feel: Vintage, evocative, and quietly intriguing, hinting at secrets buried in time.

Practical details
• Final deliverables: Print-ready PDF (front, spine, back) and a high-res eBook cover (JPEG).
• Trim size: Standard trade paperback (we can confirm exact specs once the final page count is set).
• Timeline: Initial concept sketches within the next couple of weeks, refinements shortly after, and final files by the end of next month.

I’ll send the full story synopsis and Clara’s short bio separately so you have more context.

Let me know if anything’s unclear or if you need additional references.

Looking forward to seeing your concepts!

Best,
Jane
Senior Editor, Griffin & Locke Publishing House"}
